title: General Grant National Memorial: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Download our Educators Guide for Middle School Students. Use it to prepare your students for their visit to the General Grant National Memorial, or just for within your own classroom. Lessons are adaptable for elementary and high school as well. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Interested in visiting the General Grant National Memorial with your students? Be sure to have a National Park Ranger with you to enhance the experience! All Field Trips
